author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Indian tourism ministry to set up medical & wellness boardsTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Indian tourism ministry to set up medical & wellness boards Published on : Wednesday, September 23, 2015
The ministry of tourism will announce the establishment of the medical and wellness tourism board and its brief on the occasion of World Tourism Day on 27th September 2015. But the exact functionalities of the boards will soon be chalked by the officials concenred.
The Minister of State for Culture (Independent Charge), Tourism (Independent Charge) and Civil Aviation, Mahesh Sharma, informed this while interacting live on the social media with BBC Hindi in New Delhi on Tuesday.
Sharma said that there would now be a focused approach towards Medical Tourism & all the information will be made available on a single portal. The minister disclosed that information dissemination will also take place through the all 14 overseas offices of the Ministry of Tourism.
